original_text:
And I will cast you on the ground;
    on the open field I will fling you,
and will cause all the birds of the heavens to settle on you,
    and I will gorge the beasts of the whole earth with you.
korean_text: 내가 너를 뭍에 버리며 들에 던져 공중의 새들이 네 위에 앉게 할 것임이여 온 땅의 짐승이 너를 먹어 배부르게 하리로다

sentences.original_text: And I will cast you on the ground
on the open field I will fling you
and will cause all the birds of the heavens
and I will gorge the beasts of the whole earth
